title: Time Means Money - The Scam
description: Eight years ago, Terri Lawson was unintentionally framed for a crime and sent to prison. She was disowned by her wealthy family and abandoned by her friends. Two weeks before her release, she is made an offer that she cannot refuse. After being buried alive and meeting ex-FBI director Matthew Blake, Terri survives an attempt on her life. Chased by a hit man, they flee for their lives and uncover a money scam that could lead to a global financial collapse. Trying to remain one step ahead of the killer takes them from San Francisco to London, Spain and Mexico. The last thing that they expected to discover while running for their lives was finding true love.
author: Mike  Lewis
